description: Their 100% Merino wool base layers are a wardrobe essential for every explorer, but this men's top is fashionable enough to wear out on the town, too. The side seams wrap to the front for a slim, body-enhancing fit. And the ribbed hoodie construction adds texture and style — perfect for happy hours and happier adventures.
name: Smartwool Classic Thermal Merino Base Layer Rib Hoodie - Mens
